value:
$WmMPID_双界ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_FF_Pair,Face|Yahoo!
The beach!$k$p$nMPID_仮面ルキナ|Indeed we are here...$k$p$nMPID_双界ワユ|Oh, c'mon, Marth! Aren't you even a
little bit happy to be at the BEACH?$k$p$nMPID_仮面ルキナ|Forgive me. I was truly looking
forward to this, but now that I'm
here, I feel troubled.$k$p$nMPID_双界ワユ|What? It's not complicated. We're
here to enjoy ourselves! That's it.$k$p$nMPID_仮面ルキナ|My mind can't help but linger on the
fact that a peaceful day like this could
never exist in my home world.$k$p$nMPID_双界ワユ|Oh...$k$p$nMPID_仮面ルキナ|Darkness consumed everything. Not a
day had passed without bloodshed.
Peace was a mere fleeting thought.$k$pAnd the ones I held dear to my heart,
they all...$k$p$nMPID_双界ワユ|I see. It all makes sense. That means
we've got to have the best beach day
ever now!$k$p$nMPID_仮面ルキナ|Huh?$k$p$nMPID_双界ワユ|You were summoned here for a
reason. Let's make the most of it!$k$pHaving fun is my specialty so I'll
show you the ropes!$k$p$nMPID_仮面ルキナ|Mia, you have my thanks.$k$p

$WmMPID_双界ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_FF_Pair,Face|Look, Marth! You won't believe it!
This food stall is selling shaved ice
with sweet syrup drizzled on top.$k$p$nMPID_仮面ルキナ|M-Mia! Do you mind if we take a
moment to rest for a bit?$k$pYou spun me a few too many times
before I hit that watermelon. It seems
the dizziness has caught up with me.$k$p$nMPID_双界ワユ|Haha, sorry. I started giving folks a
few more spins 'cause everybody
here is just way too strong!$k$pDon't worry. You did fine, and we
even had some pieces left to eat!$k$p$nMPID_仮面ルキナ|Oh, hm. Well, I'm glad I could be of
service. That watermelon was quite
delicious.$k$p$nMPID_双界ワユ|It was, wasn't it? And the beach has
so much more fun to offer. Just you
wait!$k$pAt dusk, we'll grill up meat skewers,
lie down by the fire, and look out
for shooting stars to wish on!$k$p$nMPID_仮面ルキナ|Mia, thank you for everything.
You've always been so kind to me.
How could I ever repay you?$k$p$nMPID_双界ワユ|Woah, don't get sappy now!
I'm no good at this sentimental stuff.$k$pI just figured 'cause your home world
sounded so rough, if I took your mind
off of it, I'd finally see you smile.$k$pAnd that means I get to have more
fun too. So we both win!$k$p$nMPID_仮面ルキナ|Understood. I'll shed no more tears.
Instead, I'll follow your lead and make
the most of this summer!$k$p$nMPID_双界ワユ|Now you're talking!
Shaved ice, here we come!$k$p
